nodes.text: Star Wars Galactic Spy is a puzzle game that was available on StarWars.com. In the game, players are tasked to find characters, objects, and alike on Tatooine, in the cities Mos Eisley and Mos Espa. These tasks are given to players by various characters, starting with Watto.

The art and illustrations used in the game, as well as some information, were adapted from the book Star Wars: Complete Locations. Galactic Spy also includes elements from Star Wars: The Clone Wars and the rest of the Star Wars Expanded Universe. The game also features cameos from Lucasfilm Ltd.'s Indiana Jones and Willow franchises.
